dcterms:description: A dataset used for few-shot semantic segmentation, specifically designed for evaluating methods that learn to segment unseen class objects with limited support images.
dcterms:title: PASCAL-5i

dcterms:description: A dataset that provides a large number of images with annotations for common objects in context, used for evaluating segmentation and detection tasks.
dcterms:title: COCO-20i
